item.title: Remove tracking from alerty URL
item.description: https://www.alerty.ai - Free APM and monitoring for your FE, BE, DB, and more + free agent runs.

item.title: Add Seline analytics
item.description: https://seline.so - Seline is a simple & private website and product analytics. Cookieless, lightweight, independent. Free plan includes 3,000 events per month and provides access to all our features, such as the dashboard, user journeys, funnels, and more.

item.title: Add PostPulse
item.description: https://post-pulse.io - Boost your online presence, enhance your SEO and site ranking with monthly AI-crafted posts to SEO-optimized domains The free Plan allows you to manually publish one Post on our site every month.

item.title: Add Clappia in the list of Low-code platforms
item.description: https://www.clappia.com - A low-code platform designed for building business process applications with customizable mobile and web apps. Offers a drag-and-drop interface, features like Offline Support, real-time location tracking and integration with various third-party services.

item.title: DNS: Add noit.at.
item.description: https://noip.at/ - Free DDNS service without registration, tracking, logging or advertising. No limit to domains.

item.title: DNS: Add Dynv6.
item.description: https://dynv6.com/docs/apis) and management of a lot of dns record types (like CNAME, MX, SPF, SRV, TXT and others - Free DDNS service with [API support](https://dynv6.com/docs/apis) and management of a lot of dns record types (like CNAME, MX, SPF, SRV, TXT and others).

item.title: Add Alerty startup monitoring
item.description: https://www.alerty.ai/?utm_source=github&utm_medium=rm&utm_campaign=awesome-developer-first - Free APM and monitoring for your FE, BE, DB, and more + free agent runs.

item.title: Add OneVM
item.description: https://onevm.uk.to/ - KVM VPS, 1 GB RAM, 1 vCore, 15 GB storage, 10 ports + 1 SSH port, 350 mbps ethernet, free 20 hours/day.

item.title: Add TempMailDetector.com
item.description: https://tempmaildetector.com/ - Verify up to 200 emails a month for free and see if an email is temporary or not.

item.title: Doprax Cloud no longer have free plan
Koyeb update free plan
item.description: https://www.koyeb.com) - Koyeb is a developer-friendly serverless platform to deploy apps globally. Seamlessly run Docker containers, web apps, and APIs with git-based deployment, native autoscaling, a global edge network, and built-in service mesh and discovery. Free Instance lets you deploy a web service in Frankfurt, Germany or Washington, D.C., US. Free Managed Postgres database available in Frankfurt (Germany), Washington, D.C. (US - Koyeb is a developer-friendly serverless platform to deploy apps globally. Seamlessly run Docker containers, web apps, and APIs with git-based deployment, native autoscaling, a global edge network, and built-in service mesh and discovery. Free Instance lets you deploy a web service in Frankfurt, Germany or Washington, D.C., US. Free Managed Postgres database available in Frankfurt (Germany), Washington, D.C. (US), and Singapore. 512MB memory, 2GB storage, and 0.1 CPU. No credit card is required to get started.
